Package org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.resthandlers

This package regroups all the general purpose Netty ChannelHandlers of the REST API.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RestExceptionHandler
    Handles all exceptions thrown by handlers during the processing of an HTTP request.
    RestHandlerHook
    This class defines hooks called before and after the corresponding AbstractRestDbHandler when a request is made.
    RestSignatureHandler
    Handler checking the REST request signature when signature checking is enabled.
    RestVersionHandler
    Handles the dispatching of incoming request between version 1 and 2 of the REST API.

Package org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.resthandlers Description

This package regroups all the general purpose Netty ChannelHandlers of the REST API.
